item.name: Windows
item.description: Microsoft Windows is a product line of proprietary graphical operating systems developed and marketed by Microsoft.

item.name: Linux
item.description: Linux is a family of open-source Unix-like operating systems based on the Linux kernel,[16] an operating system kernel first released on September 17, 1991, by Linus Torvalds.

item.name: MacOs
item.description: macOS, originally Mac OS X, previously shortened as OS X, is an operating system developed and marketed by Apple

item.name: Chrome OS
item.description: ChromeOS, sometimes styled as chromeOS and formerly styled as Chrome OS, is a Linux distribution developed and designed by Google.
